panels.name: Uptime
panels.description: uptime since last restart

panels.name: Current storage used
panels.description: The current storage size and used ratio of the cluster

panels.name: Scheduler is running
panels.description: The current running schedulers

panels.name: Store leader count
panels.description: The leader count of each TiKV instance

panels.name: Store Region count
panels.description: The Region count of each TiKV instance

panels.name: 99% Completed commands duration
panels.description: The time consumed of completing each kind of gRPC commands in .99

panels.name: PD server TSO handle time
panels.description: The time consumed of handling TiDB requests

panels.name: CPU Usage（%）
panels.description: PD cpu usage calculated with process cpu running seconds

panels.name: Memory Usage
panels.description: PD  memory usage.

panels.name: QPS
panels.description:
TiDB statement statistics.
Bold red line on right Y axis for Failed Queries per second

panels.name: Database Time by SQL Type
panels.description:
Service Time Per Second, show service time distribution among different SQL types:
1. Database time, the total time that the TiDB cluster is processing application requests.
2. The service time of different SQL types.

panels.name: Database Time by SQL Phase
panels.description:
Service Time Per Second, show service time distribution among different SQL phases.
1. Database time, the total time that the TiDB cluster is processing application requests.
2. The service time of different SQL phases.

panels.name: SQL Execute Time Overview
panels.description:
Service Time Per Second, show service time distribution among different KV/PD request:
1. Execute time, the execute time in SQL Phase
2. Service time  of different KV/PD request

panels.name: Connection Count
panels.description: TiDB current connection counts

panels.name: Slow query
panels.description: TiDB slow query statistics with slow query durations and coprocessor waiting/executing durations

panels.name: Failed Query OPM
panels.description: TiDB failed query statistics by query type

panels.name: CPU Usage（%）
panels.description: TiDB cpu usage calculated with process cpu running seconds

panels.name: Avg TiDB KV Request Duration
panels.description: tidb avg kv request duration

panels.name: Avg TiKV GRPC Duration
panels.description: tikv grpc avg duration

panels.name: Storage Async Write Duration
panels.description:
The time consumed by processing asynchronous write requests.
Storage async write duration = store duration + apply duration

panels.name: Raft store CPU（%）
panels.description: The CPU utilization of raftstore thread

panels.name: Unified read pool CPU（%）
panels.description: The CPU utilization of the unified read pool

panels.name: CPU Usage（%）
panels.description: TiFlash CPU usage calculated with process CPU running seconds.

panels.name: Memory
panels.description: The memory usage per TiFlash instance

panels.name: CDC Changefeed checkpoint
panels.description: The checkpoint ts of changefeeds.
